channel.title: Turbo Cop 9 - I took it back over r - (4/9)
channel.description:
# Ok so like all you need is the rolelist
**Cop** **Vanilla Town x6** **Mafia Goon x2**
> # Cop > Each night you can check if a player is mafia. D0 you get a guarenteed town check player.
> # Vanilla Town > lol ur useless
> # Mafia Goon > You have a factional kill every night.
1. Isaac 2. Firekitten 3. Geyde 4. Lightsin 5. 6. 7. 8. 9.

item.title: Turbo Cop 9 - I took it back over r - (4/9)
item.dc:creator: Simon
item.description:
What if someone doesn’t claim their n0 peek, and You knew in advance that they aren’t scum just because of it
I.e. what happens If someone doesn’t claim n0, in such a way that it is NAI?

item.title: Turbo Cop 9 - I took it back over r - (4/9)
item.dc:creator: eevee
item.description:
Let’s add more strategic layer.

Experienced cop strategy:

Experienced player will most likely claim a FAKE day 0 peek as cop.
If they claim it on mafia, they won’t be cop hunted. They will survive and chage a claim when outing explaining this. And if they claim it on town, they still may die, but they claimed it on town, just other one.

You need to be extreamly sure to not slip and that people won’t kill you when you claim a peek on mafia, cause killing cop with fake peek on mafia is literaly game winning for scum. Happens very rarly tho, since people cop hunt instead.

To make sure people cop hunt you do posts like mine and FKs previous ones, bringing it up that if cop survives to day 2, they have half a game confirmed.

Read full topic
item.source: Turbo Cop 9 - I took it back over r - (4/9)

item.title: Turbo Cop 9 - I took it back over r - (4/9)
item.dc:creator: eevee
item.description:
back-to-firekitten:

Cop Cover

Everyone when they get their role should claim a random N0 green on someone. That is you covering for the cop. The real cop should claim their real N0. You are not to vote this N0 or scumread them, that’s called dropping cover. It works since there’s no logs to leave checks in it.

Cop Hunting

Mafia after everyone claims a d0 peek have to analyse them.
Of course any peek claim on one of them is false and that peraon can’t be a cop. Same if anyone drops a cover. If you cam’t guess who is a cop, kill one wich is possible cop AND in opposite case is likely that he was checked.

If you won’t kill check nor cop on n1, then game comes into 7 players alive, out of wich 3 are confirmed. That would be terrible scenario.
If it happens, one mafia and real cop should claim cop. But only of they are sure they can pull it out in 1vs1 against the other one.

Read full topic
